functions.name: storage_blob_no_public_read_access
functions.description: Checks if public read access is disabled for blob storage.

functions.name: storage_blob_no_public_write_access
functions.description: Checks if public write access is disabled for blob storage.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Get_Blob_Container_Client API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
